vscode_ext_description: Sends active time from VS Code to the local SaulDaemon used by the Chrome extension.
command_test_daemon: Saul Goodman: test connection with SaulDaemon
config_enabled_description: Enables sending active time to the local SaulDaemon.
config_enable_tracking_description: Controls collection and sending of heartbeats to SaulDaemon.
config_enable_reports_description: Displays Saul's report inside VS Code.
config_api_base_description: Base URL of the local SaulDaemon.
config_pairing_key_description: Pairing key shared with the Chrome extension.
config_hash_file_paths_description: Hashes file paths sent in heartbeats.
config_hash_project_names_description: Hashes project names before sending to daemon.
config_heartbeat_interval_description: Interval in milliseconds between heartbeats sent to SaulDaemon.
config_idle_threshold_description: Maximum time without activity before considering the session inactive.
config_language_description: VS Code extension language (auto uses VS Code's language).
config_enable_telemetry_description: Enables collection of local productivity metrics (debugging, tests, tasks, terminal, etc). Data never leaves your machine.
config_telemetry_diagnostics_interval_de: Interval in seconds to sample diagnostics (errors/warnings) from files.
config_telemetry_retention_description: Number of days to retain local telemetry data before automatically deleting.
